div.p:
Good news!
Friend School has been approved to continue food service during the school closure. We will start a Grab and Go service for students 18 and under on Monday, March 23rd between 9:30 and 10:30 each morning at no charge. We ask you to come to the Auditorium drop off area where we will have a staff member to bring the Grab and Go bags to your vehicle. We will serve lunch and breakfast . . .

March 24, 2020
Dear Falcon Families,
State Superintendent Joy Hofmeister announced yesterday that she will be proposing a Continuous Learning Plan to the Oklahoma State Board of Education at their meeting this week on Wednesday, March 25, 2020. The plan will call for completing the school year without school buildings being reopened during the global pandemic. . . .

div.p:
Questions Regarding Friend School Closure through April 5, 2020
When schools close, there are usually many questions that arise. We are in an unprecedented situation, and it continues to evolve by the hour. We know this uncertainty can cause anxiety and worry. Friend School will work to keep you updated during this time.
How will I know when school will be back in session? Friend School . . .

div.p:
This afternoon, the Oklahoma State Board of Education voted unanimously to enact a mandatory, statewide closure of all public schools until April 6th. The current plan is for students to return to Friend School on the 6th. We will notify you with any additional changes.
Stay safe and enjoy the break.
